shared.model.map.handlers

Class VertexHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • shared.model.map.handlers.VertexHandler

  • public class VertexHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Stores and manages the vertices found in a map.
    Author:
    Jonathan Sadler

        Determines if there is a vertex associated with the coordinate.

        Returns:

                   throws MapException
        Adds a settlement to the map.
        Parameters:
        point - The point to add the settlement to.
        color - The color of the settlement (this sounds a little racist ... don't take it out of context).
        Throws:
        MapException - Why the settlement couldn't be added.
